duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing acute care nursing support across various departments and units.
Administering medications and treatments as per patient care plans.
Documenting patient conditions, treatment plans, and progress accurately.
Collaborating with interdisciplinary teams to ensure comprehensive patient care.
Responding to emergency situations and critical care needs promptly and effectively.
Performing diagnostic tests and interpreting results for timely interventions.
Demonstrating compassion, empathy, and support for patients and their families.
